paragraph.heading:
Coelogyne nitida (Wall. ex D.Don) Lindl., Coll. Bot .
: sub t. 33 & 37, 1824

subSubSection.paragraph:

Nepal .
: 35, 1825.

Gen . Pl.
2: 680, 1891.

Distribution:— The Himalayas, northeastern India , Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina and southwestern China .

Note:— The name
C. conferta Hort. (1875: 314)
has no proven association with
C. ochracea
subsp. c onferta and thus it has not been included in the synonymy.
